Gayed: Gold Outperforms Bitcoin Over 12 months ü™ô

David asked Michael Gayed, Portfolio Manager for The Free Markets ETF, whether gold or Bitcoin will outperform over the next year, the answer was clear: gold likely leads.

Why? Because another risk-off drawdown is expected, and Bitcoin still hasn‚Äôt proven it can hold up when equities sell off. Gold, on the other hand, continues to act as a true diversifier ‚Äî rising or falling less when markets break.
So for the next 12 months? Gold gets the heavier weighting.

*This is not investment advice, please do your own research

@davidlin_TV @leadlagreport
